name: Detailed Project Informations
desc: If you want to see detailed project informations below, please visit the 'Who Am I' post.

name: IRON-HID
desc: Create your own bad USB! It was introduced at HITBSecConf 2017.

name: Shadow-Box
desc: The lightweight hypervisor-based kernel protector. It was introduced at Black Hat Asia 2017, Black Hat Asia Arsenal 2017, and HITBSecConf 2017.

name: Linux Kernel ACPICA Bug Patch Commit
desc: It was a patch to fix operand cache leak bug.

name: TPM2.0-TSS Bug Patch Commit
desc: It was a patch to fix loaded handles bug.

name: MINT64 OS
desc: 64bit Multicore Operating System Development. It was introduced at 64-bit multi-core OS principles and structure, Vol1 & Vol2.
